name: GumGumGun
description:
You are a futuristic machine that attracts atoms, called Gum Gum Gun!! Depending on the types of molecules you have in your inventory, you can combine them to form new materials. This allows you to shoot at obstacles that can damage you and remove them out of your way! You can always try again if you are brave enough. How high will your score go?

By pressing Q or E, it will change the type of material you're shooting. Pressing  V will dump molecules in your inventory.  By clicking the left mouse, you will shoot the material in your Gum Gum Gun. At last, to move,  you need to use W for UP and S for DOWN. 

Formula breakdown:

Water: Two hydrogens(H) and one Oxygen(O) - Destroys Fire Walls

Acid: One Hydrogen, One Potassium(K), One Oxygen - Destroy Metal Walls

Lightning:  One Electron (e-) - Regain 1HP

Thanks and enjoy the game!
